title: Cane River Creole National Historical Park: History & Culture
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture             History & Culture        An 1850's map of Magnolia Plantation.           Below are links to the parks' site bulletins. The site bulletins cover a wide range of topics including plantation history, slavery, agriculture ... and much more. Click on the individual links to find out more. Agriculture American Indians Battle of Bermuda Bridge Bousillage Cash Crops Civil War on Cane River Limewash Magnolia Double Box Steam Gin Magnolia Wood Screw Gin Slavery at Magnolia Slavery at Oakland The Code Noir The Helaire Family
